directions: Blend yolk, vinegar, water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a blender. With motor running, add oil in a slow stream.
Toss crabmeat with dressing, tarragon, and chives.
Season tomatoes with salt and serve topped with romaine and crab
ingredients: 1 pound jumbo lump crabmeat, picked over
2 large tomatoes (1 1/2 to 2 pounds total), sliced thick
title: Tarragon Crab Salad
